item.title: 日产寻求学习中国供应商的战略，作为削减成本行动的一部分
item.description: 日产汽车一位高级管理人员表示，日产汽车正在研究中国供应商的成本竞争力，并探索将其做法应用到全球的方法，其目标是在广泛的增效活动中削减 2,500 亿日元（17.1 亿美元）的可变成本。【原文：Nissan Motor is studying the cost competitiveness of Chinese suppliers and exploring ways to apply their practices globally, as it aims to cut variable costs by 250 billion yen ($1.71 billion) in a broad efficiency drive, a senior executive said.】

item.title: 欧洲 最后，美联储
item.description: 洛基-斯威夫特对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Rocky Swift】

item.title: 英国《金融时报》：Ben & Jerry's 联合创始人辞职，称在联合利华旗下失去独立性
item.description: 据《金融时报》周三报道，Ben & Jerry's 联合创始人杰瑞-格林菲尔德（Jerry Greenfield）已经退出了这个他在近半个世纪前帮助创立的冰淇淋品牌。【原文：Ben & Jerry's co-founder Jerry Greenfield has quit the ice cream brand he helped launch almost half a century ago, the Financial Times reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 百时美施贵宝将出售中国合资企业60%的股份
item.description: 美国制药商百时美施贵宝公司（Bristol Myers Squibb）周二表示，该公司已签署协议，出售其在中国一家合资制药企业中持有的 60% 股份。【原文：U.S. drugmaker Bristol Myers Squibb said on Tuesday it has signed an agreement to sell its 60% ownership stake in a pharmaceutical joint venture in China.】

item.title: 日本 SBI 新世界银行正在研究用于跨境交易的代币化存款
item.description: 日本 SBI 新世界银行周三表示，正在考虑为其企业客户推出代币化存款支付服务，使他们能够以更快、更便宜的方式进行跨境支付。【原文：Japan's SBI Shinsei Bank said on Wednesday that it is considering introducing tokenised deposit payment services for its corporate clients, allowing them to make faster and cheaper cross-border payments.】

item.title: 华邮》报道：美方获释富国银行银行家被禁止离开中国
item.description: 据《华盛顿邮报》周二援引几位熟悉此事的人士的话报道，经过中美两国官员的谈判，几个月来一直被禁止离开中国的富国银行银行家毛晨悦已获准返回美国。【原文：A Wells Fargo banker, Chenyue Mao, who had been barred from leaving China for several months, has been allowed to return to the United States following negotiations between U.S. and Chinese officials, the Washington Post reported on Tuesday, citing several people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 澳大利亚银行拥有的软件正在接受社交媒体禁令测试
item.description: 澳大利亚最大银行拥有的软件正在接受测试，以遵守 12 月开始的青少年社交媒体禁令。【原文：Software owned by Australia's biggest banks is being tested as a way to comply with a teen social media ban, which begins in December, people involved in the process said, potentially involving the country's financial sector in the world-first regulatory crackdown.】

item.title: 美联储裁决在即，美元和股市萎靡不振，黄金熠熠生辉
item.description: 周三，美元处于守势，股市走低，黄金再创新高，因为全球市场都在为美联储当天晚些时候的降息预期倒计时，并在等待有关未来宽松程度的信号。【原文：The dollar was on the defensive, shares edged lower, and gold scaled new heights on Wednesday as global markets counted down to an anticipated rate cut by the Federal Reserve later in the day and waited on signals around the extent of future easing.】

item.title: 美元因降息预期和鲍威尔言论而保持柔和基调
item.description: 周三，美元兑欧元汇率在四年低点附近徘徊，美元兑日元汇率则跌至一个月低点，交易员们在为美联储稍后几乎肯定会降息做准备。【原文：The U.S. dollar loitered near four-year lows against the euro and a one-month trough against the yen on Wednesday, as traders geared up for a near-certain interest rate cut from the Federal Reserve later in the session.】

item.title: 市场等待美联储利率决议，油价保持稳定
item.description: 周三早盘，油价持稳，上一交易日因俄罗斯港口和炼油厂遭到无人机袭击而上涨超过1%，交易商正在等待美国联邦储备委员会的降息预期。【原文：Oil prices held steady in early trading on Wednesday, after rising more than 1% in the previous session on drone attacks on Russian ports and refineries, while traders awaited an expected rate cut from the U.S. Federal Reserve.】

item.title: 澳大利亚西拉资源公司在石墨供应交易中获得特斯拉缓刑
item.description: 澳大利亚西拉资源公司（Syrah Resources）周三表示，该公司已与特斯拉达成一致，同意延长处理涉嫌违反双方重要石墨供应协议的最后期限，从而为该矿商争取宝贵的时间，挽救对其美国扩张至关重要的协议。【原文：Australia's Syrah Resources said on Wednesday that it has agreed with Tesla to extend the deadline to address an alleged breach of their critical graphite supply agreement, buying the miner precious time to salvage a deal vital to its U.S. expansion.】

item.title: 中国称美国 TikTok 交易是 "双赢 "的，将审查该应用的技术和知识产权转让
item.description: 中国国家媒体周三发表社论，称在马德里达成的将短视频应用 TikTok 转由美国控制的框架协议是 "双赢 "的，并表示将审查 TikTok 的技术出口和知识产权许可。【原文：China on Wednesday called the framework deal reached in Madrid to switch short-video app TikTok to U.S.-controlled ownership a "win-win" and said it would review TikTok's technology exports and intellectual property licensing, in a state media editorial.】

item.title: 澳大利亚 Orion Minerals 公司与嘉能可集团旗下公司签署协议，将获得高达 2.5 亿美元的融资
item.description: 澳大利亚猎户座矿业公司（Orion Minerals）周三表示，该公司已与全球矿业巨头嘉能可（Glencore）旗下的一家公司签署了一份不具约束力的条款书，为其位于南非的普里斯卡铜锌矿项目提供 2 亿至 2.5 亿美元的资金。【原文：Australia's Orion Minerals said on Wednesday it has signed a non-binding term sheet with a unit of global miner Glencore for $200 million–$250 million funding for its Prieska copper-zinc project in South Africa.】

item.title: 必和必拓将暂停澳大利亚炼焦煤矿的运营并裁员
item.description: 必和必拓（BHP）周三表示，将暂停其与三菱（Mitsubishi）旗下一家公司共同拥有的昆士兰炼焦煤矿的运营，并裁员 750 人，原因是煤价低迷和州政府高额的特许权使用费降低了其收益。【原文：BHP will suspend operations and cut 750 jobs at a Queensland coking coal mine it shares with a unit of Mitsubishi, blaming low prices and high state government royalties that have dented its returns, it said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 激进投资者埃利奥特入股 Workday 超过 20 亿美元
item.description: 激进投资者埃利奥特管理公司（Elliott Management）周二表示，该公司已持有人力资源软件销售商 Workday 超过 20 亿美元的股份。【原文：Activist investor Elliott Management said on Tuesday it has taken more than $2 billion stake in human resources software seller Workday .】

item.title: 新加坡 Carro 公司融资 6000 万美元在亚洲推广日本汽车
item.description: 东南亚最大的二手车在线交易市场 Carro 周三表示，该公司在日本主权财富基金 Cool Japan Fund 领投的一轮融资中筹集了 6000 万美元。【原文：Carro, Southeast Asia's largest used-car online marketplace, has raised $60 million in a funding round led by Japan sovereign wealth fund Cool Japan Fund, the company said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 日本 8 月出口下降，汽车制造商正努力应对美国关税问题
item.description: 日本政府周三公布的数据显示，由于美国提高关税对日本汽车和其他制造业造成了更严重的影响，日本 8 月份出口连续第四个月下降。【原文：Japan's exports fell for a fourth straight month in August, government data showed on Wednesday, as elevated U.S. tariffs took a deeper toll on the country's automotive and other manufacturing sectors.】

item.title: Five Point 支持的 WaterBridge 在美国首次公开募股中融资 6.34 亿美元
item.description: 油田水管理公司 WaterBridge Infrastructure 周二表示，该公司在美国首次公开募股中募集了 6.34 亿美元，这是上市市场重获动力的最新迹象。【原文：WaterBridge Infrastructure raised $634 million in an initial public offering in the United States, the oilfield water management firm said on Tuesday, in the latest sign of renewed momentum in the listings market.】

item.title: 门票分销商 StubHub 在美国首次公开募股中筹资约 8 亿美元
item.description: 票务分销商 StubHub 周二将其首次公开募股定价为 23.50 美元，在每股 22 美元至 25 美元的市场区间内，募集资金约 8 亿美元，为其期待已久的股市首秀做好了准备。【原文：Ticket reseller StubHub on Tuesday priced its initial public offering at $23.50, within its marketed range of $22 to $25 per share, raising about $800 million and setting the stage for its long-awaited stock market debut.】

item.title: 中国腾讯通过点心债券交易融资 12.7 亿美元
item.description: 中国游戏和社交媒体领军企业腾讯控股周三表示，该公司已通过三期离岸人民币债券交易融资 90 亿元（12.7 亿美元）。【原文：Chinese gaming and social media leader Tencent Holdings said on Wednesday it had raised 9 billion yuan ($1.27 billion) in a three-tranche offshore yuan bond deal.】

item.title: 制药关税威胁逼近，葛兰素史克计划在美投资 300 亿美元
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普抵达英国进行史无前例的第二次国事访问并签署投资协议之后，葛兰素史克公司周三表示，该公司计划在未来五年内在美国投资300亿美元用于研发和供应链基础设施建设。【原文：GSK said on Wednesday it plans to invest $30 billion in research and development and supply chain infrastructure in the United States over the next five years, after U.S. President Donald Trump arrived in Britain for an unprecedented second state visit to seal investment deals.】

item.title: 英国和美国达成价值 420 亿美元的技术协议，纪念特朗普访英
item.description: 英国和美国已达成一项技术协议，以加强在人工智能、量子计算和民用核能领域的联系，以微软为首的顶级美国公司承诺向英国投资 310 亿英镑（420 亿美元）。【原文：Britain and the United States have agreed a technology pact to boost ties in AI, quantum computing and civil nuclear energy, with top U.S. firms led by Microsoft pledging 31 billion pounds ($42 billion) in UK investments.】

item.title: 美国参议员要求 Meta 提供有关儿童安全的内部数据
item.description: 据路透社看到的一封信称，美国两党参议员要求 Meta Platforms 交出关于其产品如何影响儿童以及家长控制有效性的内部评估报告。【原文：A bipartisan group of U.S. senators demanded Meta Platforms hand over internal assessments of how its products affect children and the effectiveness of its parental controls, according to a letter seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 交易日 美联储时钟滴答作响
item.description: 交易日【原文：TRADING DAY】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，特斯拉在陪审团庭审前就 2019 年加州车祸诉讼达成和解
item.description: 据彭博新闻社（Bloomberg News）周二报道，特斯拉公司达成了一项保密协议，以解决一名少年的家属提起的诉讼，这名少年在 2019 年加利福尼亚州发生的一起车祸中丧生，事故涉及一辆正在自动驾驶的 Model 3 汽车。【原文：Tesla reached a confidential deal to resolve a lawsuit by the family of a teenager who was killed in a 2019 California crash involving a Model 3 vehicle on autopilot, Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 微软计划在特朗普国事访问前向英国投资 300 亿美元
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普第二次对英国进行国事访问之前，这家软件制造商周二表示，微软计划在未来四年内向其在英国的业务和人工智能基础设施投资超过 300 亿美元。【原文：Microsoft is planning to invest more than $30 billion in its UK operations and artificial intelligence infrastructure over the next four years, the software maker said on Tuesday, ahead of U.S. President Donald Trump's second state visit to Britain.】

item.title: 据《金融时报》报道，贝莱德在人才调整中增加了主要执行委员会成员
item.description: 英国《金融时报》周二援引贝莱德首席执行官拉里-芬克（Larry Fink）和总裁罗布-卡皮托（Rob Kapito）的一封信报道称，贝莱德周二向一个委员会增派了 20 名高管，该委员会在制定全球最大资产管理公司的战略方面发挥着至关重要的作用。【原文：BlackRock on Tuesday added 20 of its top executives to a committee which plays a vital role in shaping strategy for the world's largest asset manager, the Financial Times reported on Tuesday citing a letter from chief executive Larry Fink and president Rob Kapito.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，甲骨文、银湖财团将控制美国 TikTok 公司 80% 的股份
item.description: 华尔街日报》周二援引知情人士的话报道，根据中美双方正在敲定的框架，TikTok 的美国业务将由甲骨文、银湖和 Andreessen Horowitz 等投资财团控制。【原文：TikTok's U.S. operations would be controlled by an investor consortium including Oracle , Silver Lake and Andreessen Horowitz, under a framework the U.S. and China are finalizing, the Wall Street Journal reported on Tuesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Rick's Cabaret 母公司及高管在纽约税务欺诈和贿赂案中被起诉
item.description: 纽约州总检察长莱蒂西亚-詹姆斯（Letitia James）周二表示，里克歌舞厅（Rick's Cabaret）和其他脱衣舞俱乐部的母公司以及五名高管因涉嫌参与长达 13 年的贿赂计划，逃避缴纳数百万美元的纽约销售税而被起诉。【原文：The parent company of Rick's Cabaret and other strip clubs, as well as five executives, have been indicted over their alleged roles in a 13-year bribery scheme to avoid paying millions of dollars in New York sales taxes, state Attorney General Letitia James said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 大股东称 JBS 在欧洲有收购机会
item.description: 目前在纽约上市的 JBS 公司控股股东韦斯利-巴蒂斯塔（Wesley Batista）周二在一次现场直播活动中表示，全球最大的肉类公司 JBS 认为欧洲肉类市场 "支离破碎"，因此充满收购机会。【原文：JBS , , the world's largest meat company, sees the European meat market as "fragmented" and therefore full of acquisition opportunities, Wesley Batista, controlling shareholder of the company now listed in New York, said on Tuesday during an event broadcast live.】
